title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. II, pt. 52 - Pilot Licenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. II, pt. 52 - Pilot Licenses

State Regulations
§ 52.1 - Temporary pilot license
§ 52.2 - Posting of names of candidates for license
§ 52.3 - Written examination required for original pilot license and for extension of license
§ 52.4 - Eye examination required
§ 52.5 - Term of license; exceptions
§ 52.6 - Charge for license
§ 52.7 - Bond requirement and sureties
§ 52.8 - Pilot licenses
§ 52.9 - Reduction in grade of licenses
§ 52.10 - Personal application for renewal or increase of license
§ 52.11 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. II, pt. 52

Statutory authority: Navigation Law, §95

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
